title: Modi holds rally with thousands as virus rips through India
description: CNN's Clarissa Ward reports from New Delhi on the growing criticism of Prime Minister Narendra Modi over his failure to control a second wave of the coronavirus pandemic in India.

title: Pentagon tracking out-of-control Chinese rocket that could reenter Earth's atmosphere
description: The Pentagon has said it is tracking a large Chinese rocket that is out of control and set to reenter Earth's atmosphere this weekend, raising concerns about where its debris may make impact.

title: Conan announces his last show after three decades in late night
description: Conan O'Brien announces the final episode of "Conan" will air on TBS June 24th. After 30 years in late night comedy, he's leaving for a new show on streaming service HBO Max.
